title: Science Information Literacy Education Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Core science curriculum knowledge and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Blended approach combining smartphone-based mobile learning with offline workshops, applying a teacher-librarian collaboration model

learning_goals: Learners can select and utilize credible information from academic databases for science lesson design
Learners implement plagiarism prevention strategies when developing science materials for elementary students by applying information ethics standards
Learners design cross-curricular information utilization lesson modules and create evaluation rubrics according to IDEA model phases

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
